articles.description: Follow live text updates and listen to BBC Radio 5 Live commentary as Chelsea face Real Madrid in their Group D opener in the Women's Champions League.
articles.title: Women's Champions League: Build-up to Real Madrid v Chelsea

articles.description: India reach the World Cup final by holding off New Zealand on a memorable night in Mumbai that included Virat Kohli's record-breaking 50th one-day international century.
articles.title: India beat NZ to reach final after Kohli record century

articles.description: Anthony Joshua and Deontay Wilder will fight separate opponents on the same night as part of a stacked card on 23 December in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
articles.title: Joshua & Wilder to fight on same card in Saudi Arabia

articles.description: Chelsea could face further scrutiny from football's authorities over reports of payments connected to the club's former owner Roman Abramovich.
articles.title: Chelsea could face scrutiny over alleged Abramovich payments

articles.description: Virat Kohli hits a record-breaking century and Mohammed Shami claims 7-57 to help India book their place in the Cricket World Cup final after a 70-run victory over New Zealand in Mumbai.
articles.title: Kohli and Shami lead India to World Cup final

articles.description: Manchester United chief executive Richard Arnold is set to leave the club, BBC Sport understands.
articles.title: Man Utd chief executive Arnold set to leave club

articles.description: Former UFC fighter Julie Kedzie tells BBC Sport about her decision to donate her brain for research.
articles.title: Ex-UFC fighter Kedzie to donate brain for research

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz gets his ATP Finals campaign back on track with a win over Andrey Rublev in which the Russian hit himself so hard he drew blood.
articles.title: Alcaraz beats frustrated Rublev at ATP Finals

articles.description: Former England all-rounder Andrew Flintoff has been appointed head coach of Northern Superchargers men's side in The Hundred.
articles.title: Flintoff named Northern Superchargers men's coach

articles.description: Anthony Joshua says he'll "smoke" Otto Wallin after it was announced the two would fight each other on the same card as Deontay Wilder on 23 December in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
articles.title: 'On a bad day I'll smoke him' - Joshua on fighting Wallin
